snippet.desc: Allows the actor to move up, down, left and right.
snippet.description: Allows the actor to move up, down, left and right.
snippet.name: 4 Way Movement

boolean.desc: If selected, the actor will not be able to turn while moving.
boolean.name: _StopTurning

number.desc: The speed of the movement.
number.name: _Speed

boolean.desc:
If selected, the actor will stop moving if diagonal keys are pressed at the same.
If unselected, the actor will move in the direction of the most recently pressed key.
boolean.name: _DiagonalStop

boolean.desc:
If selected, the control attributes will be used to control the movement.
If unselected, the control attributes are ignored and the movement can be controlled by triggering custom events.
Trigger the events MoveUp, MoveDown, MoveLeft or MoveRight to make the actor move as if the keys were pressed.
boolean.name: _UseControls

boolean.desc: If selected, the animation attributes will be used, otherwise they will be ignored.
boolean.name: _UseAnimations

snippet.desc: Make the actor follow a given actor.
snippet.description: Make the actor follow a given actor.
snippet.name: Follow Target

actor.desc:
The target actor this actor will follow.
If the target actor is unset or dead this behavior will do nothing.
actor.name: _TargetActor

number.desc: The speed to move towards the target.
number.name: _Speed

number.desc: The actor will not move closer to the target than this value.
number.name: _Margin

boolean.desc:
If selected, the actor will move faster if farther away from the target and slower if closer to to the target.
If unselected, the actor will move towards the target at a constant speed as specified in the Speed attribute.
boolean.name: _Easing

number.desc:
Only used when Easing is selected.
The actor will move at least at this speed. The actual speed depends on the distance to the target. The maximum speed is Minimum Easing Speed plus Speed. The actor will move at maximum speed if it is in the opposite diagonal corner of the target.
number.name: _MinimumEasingSpeed

boolean.desc:
If selected, the actor will stop moving when colliding with the target actor.
If unselected, the actor will instead continue to and push the target around.
boolean.name: _StopwhenColliding

actorgroup.desc: What group can this actor stomp on?
actorgroup.name: _StompableGroup

boolean.desc: Does the down key have to be held down to ground pound?
boolean.name: _DownKeyRequired

number.desc: Amount of force to push the Actor down
number.name: _Force

snippet.desc:
Prevent the actor from leaving the scene.

The actor will still be able to leave the screen, but it cannot leave the scene.
snippet.description:
Prevent the actor from leaving the scene.

The actor will still be able to leave the screen, but it cannot leave the scene.
snippet.name: Cannot Exit Scene

snippet.desc: Allows the actor to move up and down.
snippet.description: Allows the actor to move up and down.
snippet.name: 2 Way Vertical Movement

boolean.desc:
If selected, the control attributes will be used to control the movement.
If unselected, the control attributes are ignored and the movement can be controlled by triggering custom events. Trigger the event MoveUp or MoveDown to make the actor move as if the keys were pressed.
boolean.name: _UseControls

boolean.desc: If selected, the actor will not be able to move horizontally.
boolean.name: _PreventHorizontalMovement

number.desc: The speed of the movement.
number.name: _Speed

boolean.desc: If selected, the animation attributes will be used, otherwise they will be ignored.
boolean.name: _UseAnimations

boolean.desc: If selected, the actor will not be able to turn while moving.
boolean.name: _StopTurning

snippet.desc: Prevent the actor from leaving the screen.
snippet.description: Prevent the actor from leaving the screen.
snippet.name: Cannot Exit Screen

snippet.desc: Attach to an actor to make the camera follow it. You can then specify the speed at which the camera should "scroll" towards the actor.
snippet.description: Attach to an actor to make the camera follow it. You can then specify the speed at which the camera should "scroll" towards the actor.
snippet.name: Camera Follow

number.desc: INTERNAL ATTRIBUTE: The x-position that the camera should be.
number.name: _intendedCameraX

number.desc: INTERNAL ATTRIBUTE: The y-position that the camera should be.
number.name: _intendedCameraY

number.desc: INTERNAL ATTRIBUTE: The current x-position of the camera.
number.name: _currentCameraX

number.desc: INTERNAL ATTRIBUTE: The current y-position of the camera.
number.name: _currentCameraY

number.desc: The speed, in pixels per frame, that the camera should scroll by following the actor. Leave as 0 to indicate an instant jump.
number.name: _ScrollSpeed

snippet.desc:
Makes the actor bounce off with the same speed after colliding.

Important: This overrides the bounciness in the physics settings of the actor, but the bounciness must be greater than 0 for this behavior to work.
snippet.description:
Makes the actor bounce off with the same speed after colliding.

Important: This overrides the bounciness in the physics settings of the actor, but the bounciness must be greater than 0 for this behavior to work.
snippet.name: Bounce With Full Speed

event.displayName: Enters Region Copy Copy Copy Copy
event.name: event-actor-region

event.displayName: Enters Region Copy Copy Copy Copy Copy
event.name: event-actor-region

event.displayName: Enters Region Copy Copy Copy Copy Copy
event.name: event-actor-region

snippet.desc: Emphasises the actor in some way when the cursor is placed over it. Options include fade, grow, shrink, brighten, darken and more.
snippet.description: Emphasises the actor in some way when the cursor is placed over it. Options include fade, grow, shrink, brighten, darken and more.
snippet.name: Emphasise On Mouse Over

text.desc: The type of emphasis applied to the actor on mouse over. Includes fade, grow, shrink, brighten and darken.
text.dropdown: Fade=Fade Grow=Grow Shrink=Shrink Turn Clockwise=Turn Clockwise Turn Anti-Clockwise=Turn Anti-Clockwise Brighten=Brighten Darken=Darken Tint=Tint Grayscale=Grayscale Negative=Negative Sepia=Sepia
text.name: _TypeOfEmphasis

number.desc: The amount of time, in seconds, which it should take for the actor to go from unemphasised to emphasised. Only applies to grow, shrink and fade.
number.name: _EmphasisTime

number.desc: The amount, as a percentage, to emphasise the actor by, relative to it's normal state (don't use negative values). Does not apply to grayscale, negative and sepia.
number.name: _EmphasisAmount

color.desc: The colour to use, if you are using the tint option.
color.name: _TintingColour

snippet.desc: Makes the actor follow the mouse.
snippet.description: Makes the actor follow the mouse.
snippet.name: Follow the Mouse

number.desc: The speed to move towards the mouse.
number.name: _Speed

number.desc: The actor will not move closer than this to the mouse.
number.name: _Margin

boolean.desc:
If selected, the actor will move faster if farther away from the mouse and slower if closer to to the mouse.
If unselected, the actor will move towards the target at a constant speed as specified in the Speed attribute.
boolean.name: _Easing

number.desc:
Only used when Easing is selected.
The actor will move at least at this speed. The actual speed depends on the distance to the mouse. The maximum speed is Minimum Easing Speed plus Speed. The actor will move at maximum speed if it is in the opposite diagonal corner of the mouse.
number.name: _MinimumEasingSpeed

text.desc:
Always: The actor will always follow the mouse.
When Pressed: The actor will follow the mouse only when it is pressed, and keep on moving when the mouse is released.
When Pressed, Else Stop: The actor will follow the mouse only when it is pressed, and stop when the mouse is released.
text.dropdown: Always=Always When Pressed=WhenPressed When Pressed, Else Stop=WhenPressedElseStop
text.name: _Follow

snippet.desc: Make the actor move around and wait randomly.
snippet.description: Make the actor move around and wait randomly.
snippet.name: Wander

number.desc: The minimum time the actor keeps on moving before waiting.
number.name: _MinimumMovingTime

number.desc: The maximum time the actor keeps on moving before waiting.
number.name: _MaximumMovingTime

number.desc: The minimum time the actor keeps on waiting before moving again.
number.name: _MinimumWaitingTime

number.desc: The maximum time the actor keeps on waiting before moving again.
number.name: _MaximumWaitingTime

boolean.desc:
If selected, start with waiting.
If unselected, move right away.
boolean.name: _StartwithWaiting

number.desc: The maximum moving speed.
number.name: _MaximumSpeed

number.desc: The minimum moving speed.
number.name: _MinimumSpeed

boolean.desc:
If selected, the actor will change the movement direction when colliding.
If unselected, the actor will try to keep on moving in the current direction.
boolean.name: _ChangeDirectionwhenColliding

snippet.desc: Allows the actor to move left and right.
snippet.description: Allows the actor to move left and right.
snippet.name: 2 Way Horizontal Movement

boolean.desc:
If selected, the control attributes will be used to control the movement.
If unselected, the control attributes are ignored and the movement can be controlled by triggering custom events. Trigger the events MoveLeft or MoveRight to make the actor move as if the keys were pressed.
boolean.name: _UseControls

boolean.desc: If selected, the actor will not be able to move vertically.
boolean.name: _PreventVerticalMovement

number.desc: The speed of the movement.
number.name: _Speed

boolean.desc: If selected, the animation attributes will be used, otherwise they will be ignored.
boolean.name: _UseAnimations

boolean.desc: If selected, the actor will not be able to turn while moving.
boolean.name: _StopTurning
